section.p: ‘This is the very idol of which I spoke!’ cries the priest delightedly.
He takes the winged idol from you and installs it inside the teepee. Cross it off your list of possessions and get the codeword Cushat.
You also have the chance to increase your SCOUTING score by 1 if you can roll higher than your current SCOUTING score on two dice.
